info.name: barnard59-http
info.description: HTTP protocol support for Barnard59 Linked Data pipelines
info.author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)

operations.label: HTTP GET request
operations.comment: Makes a HTTP GET request and returns the body of the response as stream.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-http/get.js#default>
].

operations.label: HTTP POST request
operations.comment: Makes a HTTP POST request, sends the written data as request body and returns the body of the response as stream.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-http/post.js#default>
].
